title.narrative: Programme Capital Costs for Chars Livelihoods Programme 2

description.narrative: This activity (Programme Capital Costs for Chars Livelihoods Programme 2) is a component of Chars Livelihoods Programme 2 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of goods' and a budget of £7,185,864. This component benefits Bangladesh, and works in the following sector(s): Decentralisation and support to subnational government, Social Protection, Rural development. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited, Maxwell Stamp PLC. The start date is 01-09-2009 and the end date is 30-06-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Decentralisation and support to subnational government

description.narrative: Other General Services - General Public Service - Other General Services - Local Government Administration
